channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 11076f67-66f6-4be0-8f6b-f0609fd05cc9
Display name: Azure Batch Account Reader
Description: Lets you view all resources including pools and jobs in the Batch account.
Link: https://management.azure.com/11076f67-66f6-4be0-8f6b-f0609fd05cc9?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 6aaa78f1-f7de-44ca-8722-c64a23943cae
Display name: Azure Batch Data Contributor
Description: Grants permissions to manage Batch pools and jobs but not to modify accounts.
Link: https://management.azure.com/6aaa78f1-f7de-44ca-8722-c64a23943cae?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 48e5e92e-a480-4e71-aa9c-2778f4c13781
Display name: Azure Batch Job Submitter
Description: Lets you submit and manage jobs in the Batch account.
Link: https://management.azure.com/48e5e92e-a480-4e71-aa9c-2778f4c13781?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 29fe4964-1e60-436b-bd3a-77fd4c178b3c
Display name: Azure Batch Account Contributor
Description: Grants full access to manage all Batch resources, including Batch accounts, pools and jobs.
Link: https://management.azure.com/29fe4964-1e60-436b-bd3a-77fd4c178b3c?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 0b6ca2e8-2cdc-4bd6-b896-aa3d8c21fc35
Display name: Defender CSPM Storage Data Scanner
Description: Grants access to read blobs and files. This role is used by the data scanner of Dfender CSPM.
Link: https://management.azure.com/0b6ca2e8-2cdc-4bd6-b896-aa3d8c21fc35?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 5c2d7e57-b7c2-4d8a-be4f-82afa42c6e95
Display name: Azure Managed Grafana Workspace Contributor
Description: Can manage Azure Managed Grafana resources, without providing access to the workspaces themselves.
Link: https://management.azure.com/5c2d7e57-b7c2-4d8a-be4f-82afa42c6e95?api-version=2022-04-01
